mapper.select: select * from lz_blog.blogs b, lz_blog.tags t where b.id = #{id} and b.tag_id = t.id and b.deleted = 0;
mapper.update: update lz_blog.blogs b, lz_blog.tags t set blog_name = #{blogName}, location = #{location}, tag_id = #{tagId}, short_content = #{shortContent} where b.id = #{id} and b.deleted = 0;
mapper.insert: insert into lz_blog.blogs(id, blog_name, location, tag_id, short_content) VALUES (#{id}, #{blogName}, #{location}, #{tagId}, #{shortContent});
mapper.select: select count(1) from lz_blog.blogs where deleted = 0;
